title: How to deal with privacy and GDPR in Event-Sourced systems
description: Privacy is an essential topic in software systems nowadays. The recent regulations with international repercussions, such as GDPR, forced the industry to consider it even if they had not before. It's a fair move, but applying those rules may be non-trivial. In the webinar, I will explain the most popular strategies for dealing with privacy in event-sourced systems.
